0101101100100111 0101001101101101 0 -> sum: 1010111010010100, cout: 0
1111011111010001 1000000101011100 0 -> sum: 0111100100101101, cout: 1
1100111100001111 1011111000001000 1 -> sum: 1000110100011000, cout: 1
0010010100010101 0000000110001011 1 -> sum: 0010011010100001, cout: 0
1110100000111110 0101101101101111 0 -> sum: 0100001110101101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
